jokes: Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems.
Parallel lines have so much in common. It's a shame they'll never meet.
Why was the equal sign so humble? Because it knew it wasn't less than or greater than anyone else.
Why was the obtuse angle so depressed? It was never right.
Why did the two fours skip lunch? They already eight.
What did one math book say to the other? Don't bother me, I've got my own problems!
Why was the geometry book always sad? It could never find a solution to its problems.
What is a math teacher's favorite place in New York City? Times Square.
Why was the student's report card always so wrinkled? Because it kept multiplying by itself!
Why was the math lecture so long? Because the professor kept going off on a tangent.
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field.
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything.
Why did the bicycle fall over? It was two-tired.
Why did the physics teacher break up with the biology teacher? There was no chemistry.
What do you get when you mix sulfur, tungsten, and silver? SWAG.
Why did the doctor carry a red pen? In case they needed to draw blood.
What did one ocean say to the other ocean? Nothing, they just waved.
Why did the bacteria take the elevator? Because it was a cell-tower.
Why did the astronaut break up with his girlfriend? Because he needed space.
What do you call a fish wearing a crown? A king-fish.
Why was the computer cold? It left its Windows open.
Why was the JavaScript developer sad? Because he didn't know how to 'null' his feelings.
Why did the console gamer break up with the PC gamer? He just couldn't 'console' him anymore.
Why did the gamer go to jail? He couldn't stop casing.
Why did the gamer quit his job? He couldn't handle the pixels.
Why did the game console go to school? To improve its graphics.
Why did the gamer cross the road? To render the other side.
Why did the gamer break up with his girlfriend? She didn't respawn.
Why did the game character go to therapy? He had too many issues.
Why did the gamer bring a ladder to the bar? He heard the drinks were on the house.
